dashboard.history_empty: Your conversation history will appear here.
dashboard.drill_desc: A quick, high-intensity workout to start your day.
dashboard.drill_desc_nextup: A quick workout to warm you up.
dashboard.converse_desc: Jump into real-world scenarios with an AI partner.
dashboard.shadow_desc: Perfect your pronunciation of key phrases.
dashboard.gym_desc: Focus on specific sounds to perfect your speech.
dashboard.plan_desc_free: Get a custom plan to reach your goals faster.
dashboard.explorer_desc: Discuss any topic with a search-powered AI.
dashboard.next_task_in_plan: Your next task in your personalized plan.
dashboard.unlock_plan_prompt: Upgrade to Pro to unlock your personalized plan!

errors.speech_not_supported_desc: Sorry, your browser does not support the Web Speech API. Please try Chrome or Edge.
errors.mic_error_desc: Could not record audio. Please grant microphone permissions and ensure your mic is working.
errors.mic_error_desc_short: Could not record. Please ensure your browser has microphone access and it's not in use.

conversation.title: Conversation Practice
conversation.subtitle: Choose a scenario to start talking.

job-interview.description: Practice answering common questions for a a software engineer role.

daily-scrum.description: Give updates and discuss blockers in a typical agile meeting.

coffee-chat.description: Practice small talk and professional networking.

behavioral-interview-pro.description: Handle tough behavioral questions using the STAR method.

shadowing.title: Chunk Shadowing
shadowing.subtitle: Practice key phrases to improve your fluency and pronunciation.
shadowing.upgrade_prompt: Upgrade to Pro for detailed scoring & analysis

plan.unlock_desc: Go Pro to get a step-by-step, 4-week learning journey tailored to your goals, including advanced feedback and exclusive content.
plan.title: Your Personalized Fluency Plan
plan.subtitle: Your 4-week guided journey to speaking with confidence.
plan.w2t3: Focus on sentence stress and intonation
plan.w4t2: Use 5 new chunks naturally in conversation

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Unlock your full potential and speak English with confidence.
pricing.free_desc: Get started and build a solid foundation.
pricing.pro_desc: Accelerate your learning with personalized tools.

drill.title: 5-Minute Drill
drill.subtitle: A high-intensity workout to boost your speaking reflexes. Get ready to speak, listen, and react quickly!
drill.finished_subtitle: Amazing work! You've completed your daily speaking workout and strengthened your English skills.

explorer.unlock_desc: Go Pro to practice discussing any topic you're interested in with an AI powered by Google Search, complete with sources for fact-checking and further reading.
explorer.title: Topic Explorer
explorer.subtitle: Practice English by discussing any topic you're interested in. Powered by Google Search for up-to-date information.
explorer.placeholder: e.g., The future of AI, recent space discoveries...

settings.login_prompt: Please log in to view settings.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your learning experience.
settings.accent_desc: Choose the accent you want to hear from your AI coach during practice sessions.

review.not_found_desc: Sorry, we couldn't find the conversation you're looking for.
review.title: Review
review.footer: This is a read-only review of your past conversation.

history.login_prompt: Please log in to view your history.
history.title: Conversation History
history.subtitle: Review your past practice sessions and track your progress.

onboarding.step1_desc: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started on your journey to fluency.
onboarding.step2_desc: Jump into realistic scenarios like job interviews or daily stand-ups to practice speaking with an AI partner.
onboarding.step3_desc: Use 'Chunk Shadowing' to repeat key phrases and get instant, detailed feedback on your speech.
onboarding.step4_desc: Short on time? A daily drill is a quick, high-intensity workout to keep your skills sharp.

gym.title: Pronunciation Gym
gym.subtitle: Select a sound to focus on and perfect your pronunciation.
gym.pro_prompt: Upgrade to Pro to unlock more sounds.
gym.completed_desc: You've completed all items for this sound. Practice makes perfect!

th-voiceless.name: Voiceless 'th'
th-voiceless.description: Practice the 'th' sound as in 'think'. Your tongue should be between your teeth.

th-voiced.name: Voiced 'th'
th-voiced.description: Practice the 'th' sound as in 'this'. Feel the vibration in your throat.

r-sound.name: 'r' Sound
r-sound.description: Practice the American 'r' sound. Your tongue should not touch the roof of your mouth.

l-sound.name: 'l' Sound
l-sound.description: Practice the 'l' sound. Your tongue tip should touch the ridge behind your top teeth.
